overview: Peter who is able to see other’s dreams.  He loves to make fun of others by  revealing their secrets that he saw in their dreams.  As he roams around in other’s dreams, he discovers and enters his girl friend’s door, but, her dream seems different from the one that he came in last time.  From there, as he finds out his own corps, he runs away from his girl friend.
title: 배드드림 (Bad Dream)
